====================================

### Passenger Vessel Tender Announcement

#### Title
Passenger Vessel for Hire by Conservation and Protection for Patrols in Waters Surrounding Prince Edward Island

#### Reference Number
CB-4783-56662776

#### Amendment Number
1 (latest version)

#### Solicitation Number
30004105A

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

#### Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a passenger vessel to provide transportation services for Conservation and Protection (CP) personnel and equipment for patrols in waters surrounding Prince Edward Island.

The required vessel must be between 40 to 44 feet in overall length, with a service of a captain and one crew member. The crew member will assist with boarding and gear inspections as required by Fishery Officers.

Key services include:

* Gear inspections and patrols with Fishery Officers on board
* Hauling of lobster traps, crab traps, gill nets, shellfish harvesting gear, long lines, and other types of fishing gear and apparatuses
* Conducting coastal patrols in lobster, rock crab, herring, recreational mackerel, striped bass, tuna, groundfish fisheries, and others as required

The selected vessel must possess the following capabilities:

* A minimum deck space of 25 crab traps or 50 lobster traps
* Ability to achieve a minimum speed of 15 knots and maintain a cruising speed of 15 knots or above for prolonged periods
* Acceptable lavatory facility

#### Tender Documents

To access the tender documents, please visit [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4783/30004105a-rfp-%28en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4783/30004105a-rfp-%28en.pdf) for English or [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4783/30004105a-ddp-%28fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4783/30004105a-ddp-%28fr.pdf) for French.
